com.dhemery.expressions.polling

Class DefaultPollingSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.expressions.PollingSchedule
      • com.dhemery.expressions.polling.DefaultPollingSchedule

  • public class DefaultPollingSchedule
extends PollingSchedule
    A singleton polling schedule with the default polling interval and duration.

    The default polling interval is specified (in milliseconds) by the system property with the key: 

          com.dhemery.expressions.polling.interval.millis
    If the system has no such property, the default polling interval is 1 second.

    The default polling duration is specified (in milliseconds) by the system property with the key: 

          com.dhemery.expressions.polling.interval.millis
    If the system has no such property, the default polling duration is 1 minute.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DURATION_PROPERTY
      The key for the system property that defines this schedule's default polling duration.
      static Duration FALLBACK_POLLING_DURATION
      The polling duration to use if the system properties do not specify a default.
      static Duration FALLBACK_POLLING_INTERVAL
      The polling interval to use if the system properties do not specify a default.
      static PollingSchedule INSTANCE
      The singleton instance of this default polling schedule.
      static String INTERVAL_PROPERTY
      The key for the system property that defines this schedule's default polling interval.
